title: Daedalia Planum
description: This is an image of Daedalia Planum, located 1000 km south of Arsia Mons, a southern volcano of the Tharsis Montes. The image was taken on 19 July 2005, from a distance of 302 km from the surface.
theme:
MARS. The Red Planet, one of the most desirable
destinations for humanity
